name: MEC Vektor 65L Backpack - Unisex
description:
Leave your worries at the trailhead. Built for backcountry life, this lightweight trekking pack combines convenient trail features with a Recco® reflector for added safety. A supportive frame keeps you grounded when you're carrying your home on your back.210-denier nylon and 200-denier polyester fabric.PU coating (1500mm) and DWR treatment.Aluminum frame with air mesh harness, and adjustable sternum strap.Contoured hipbelt, with zippered pockets.Floating lid, with zippered pockets.1 expandable front and 2 side stretch mesh pockets.Hydration compatible (sold separately).Moveable compression straps.Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams..Daisy chains, with pole attachments.

        Sustainability
